page.description: Condition list for report (used for conditional rows).

property.name: Expression
property.description:
Type: "C",
Condition expression (should evaluate to true or false)

property.name: preCondition
property.description:
Type: "N",
Iindex into condiiton object array that contains conditions.

property.name: value
property.description:
Type: "L",
Current value of condition expression (true or false).

property.name: rowEnd
property.description:
Type: "N",
First row after condition (else if/else or endif for preceeding condition).

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.
